com.sri.modules.speech
Class Speech

java.lang.Object
  com.sri.kernel.modules.DefaultModule
      com.sri.modules.speech.Speech
All Implemented Interfaces:
Module
public class Speech
extends DefaultModule

This is a module that is loaded by the SR4 Kernel, the core of the robot system. All modules extend DefaultModule, which defines necessary methods used by the SR4 Kernel's Module Loader.

This module controls the Text to Speech hardware, which uses the onboard I2C bus for communication. To allow outside objects and processes to access the functionality it defines an SRML element

Specification for writing modules can be found in documentation

Version:
1.0
Author:
Joseph Monti, Smart Robots

Method Detail

initModule

public boolean initModule(ModuleData md)
This is called by the Module Loader. It grabs a reference to an i2c port and initializes the input and output streams.

Specified by:
initModule in interface Module
Overrides:
initModule in class DefaultModule
Parameters:
md - The given ModuleData.
Returns:
True if the module has successfully initialized, false otherwise. This method always returns true.

cleanupModule

public void cleanupModule()
Description copied from class: DefaultModule
No Action Taken. Called when the module is unloaded.

runDiagnostic

public boolean runDiagnostic(int level,
                             java.io.PrintStream ps)
Description copied from class: DefaultModule
Performs a diagnostic at the given [level] using the Print Stream [ps] for status reports. This implemention simply returns true.

Specified by:
runDiagnostic in interface Module
Overrides:
runDiagnostic in class DefaultModule
Parameters:
level - The level of the diagnostic.
ps - The print stream to which messages should be written.
Returns:
true
